overview: Before the 2022 feature there was the award-winning 2019 short. 'Egghead & Twinkie' focuses with a comedic tone on sexual orientation, gender, and Asian-American mixed race identity. Egghead & Twinkie are best friends who are both about to reveal a secret: Egghead is in love with Twinkie. Twinkie is a lesbian.
tagline: A coming of age comedy about coming out
title: Egghead & Twinkie
